title: Grocery tracking might soon appear on Pixel At a Glance widget
content:
Google has a few special software features reserved for its Pixel smartphones, and one of them is the ‘At a Glance’ widget. Even though a widget with the same name is available on all Android devices (provided by the Google app), the version on Pixel phones has additional integrations and a slightly-different look. If a

The post Grocery tracking might soon appear on Pixel At a Glance widget appeared first on xda-developers.
